title: test/fixedbugs/bug408.go failing
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. hg pull -u
2. ./all.bash

What is the expected output?
A successful build and test run

What do you see instead?
--- cd ../test
bug: fixedbugs/bug408.go
15a16,18
> =========== fixedbugs/bug408.go
> BUG: errchk: command succeeded unexpectedly
> 
0 known bugs; 1 unexpected bugs; test output differs
FAILED


Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
6g

Which operating system are you using?
OS X

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
fae148fab2a7 tip

Please provide any additional information below.
â†’  env | grep '^GO'
GOBIN=/Users/jhodges/projects/go/bin
GOARCH=amd64
GOROOT=/Users/jhodges/projects/go
GOOS=darwin
GOPATH=/Users/jhodges/projects/gocode/

and $PATH includes $GOBIN. I include this because I'm no longer sure what is what the
expected values of those are and can't find the relevant docs.
